bill.summary: 9/14/1993--Introduced. Rural Emergency Care Access Hospital Act of 1993 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) permit certain rural hospitals under Medicare to serve as rural emergency access care hospitals under Medicare; and (2) provide for coverage of rural emergency access care hospital services under Medicare part B.
